narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Cornerstone Healing Center, LLC is a Counselor, Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) provider based in Scottsdale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.4M in Medicaid payments across 76K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
